Package whodonedidit.skeletons

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Action
    Interface Action will be implemented by subclasses to represent all possible Actions a player can take during a game of Who Done Did It All Actions will be constructed by players and then sent to the Game Manager to be executed.
    Instruction
    Interface Instruction facilitates communication from the Game Manager to the Player.
    MessageListener
    MessageListener class is implemented by classes that want to listen to messages from the server and client.
    TimeoutListener
    TimeoutListener This interface represents something that can respond to something it relies on timing out.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionCard
    ActionCard serves to hold the type and description of one of the action card objects that will make up the deck.
    AIController
    AIController This class represents the intelligence between a computer player that decides its actions and responses.
    AIResources
    AIResources This singleton contains resources to be used by AIControllers in the game.
    AllSnoop
    The All Snoop class represents a player playing an All Snoop card on the table.
    Client
    The client class represents a client that will be connected to the game server.
    ClueCard
    ClueCard serves to hold the name and description of one of the clue card objects that will make up the deck.
    Controller
    The Controller connects the GUI to the backend model.
    Deck
    Deck is used to create all of clue cards and action cards being used by the game.
    DestinationMarker
    DestinationMarker is used to represent one of the destination markers being used in the game.
    DiscardPile
    DiscardPile serves as an object to temporarily store the played action cards until the deck needs to be reset.
    DisproveSuggestion
    This class is used to instruct the Player to search through their hand and try to disprove the suggestion that was given.
    DoTurn
    Sent from the game manager to the player so that they can begin their turn.
    EndGame
    Instruction for notifying player that the game has ended and a player has won
    EndTurn
    The endTurn action gives the game manager information needed to end the turn of the current player and then tells the next player to take their turn.
    GameManager
    GameManager This class represents a referee or manager for the game, acting out player's turns, requesting input or action from players, and informing players of events happening during the game.
    GameMessenger
    The GameMessenger class is an adapter to the server class that allows a message to be sent over the server or locally in an offline mode.
    GetNotified
    Instruction for notifying player of other players' actions
    GUIApp
    GUIApp contains the runnable main to initialize the GUI client application.
    Hand
    Hand serves to represent the player's collection of ClueCards, ActionMarkers, and a DestinationMarker.
    LobbyController
    The lobby controller is responsible for updating the Lobby interface based on responses from the server and informing the server when game settings have been changed.
    LobbyMessenger
    The LobbyMessenger class represents a messenger between clients and the server before the game starts.
    LobbyPlayer
    LobbyPlayer This will hold a user name and specific descriptor for a player that has joined a lobby, and will be used by LobbyController.
    MakeAccusation
    The makeAccusation class will construct an action that is capable of conducting all the logic needed to make an accusation during the game.
    MakeSuggestion
    Represents the action a player takes when they play a suggest from current destination card or suggest from any destination card.
    Player
    Player An abstract class representing a Player in a "Who Done Did It?" game
    PlayerMessenger
    PlayerMessenger is used to facilitate communication between the player and the game manager.
    PlayerStateMachine
    PlayerStateMachine This class acts as a state machine that contains the PlayerState of a player.
    PrivateTip
    Represents the action taken when a player plays a Private Tip A private tip asks one player to: "Show me all your Suspect Cards."(1) "Show me all your Vehicle Cards." (1) "Show me all your Destination Cards." (1) "Show me one female Suspect Card." (1) "Show me one red Vehicle Card." (1) "Show me one northern Destination Card." (1) SRS Functional Requirement: 2.4, Extension G
    ReceiveClueCards
    Instruction to tell players that they have received Clue Cards that they want to see.
    ReceiveInitialCards
    Instruction for player to take the given hand as their hand
    RespondWithClueCards
    Instruction to tell a player to respond to a specific description with any cards that fits the description.
    SendClueCards
    An action sent from the player to notify the game manager that they have sent clue cards.
    Server
    Extension of AbstractServer to communicate with all clients joining the game.
    ServerApp
    ServerApp class is used to start the server application.
    Snoop
    Represents the action that takes place after a player plays a Snoop card.
    Solution
    The solution class represents a solution of 3 clue cards picked during a game of Who Done Did it? There is 1 person card, 1 vehicle card and 1 destination card in a solution.
    SuperSleuth
    Represents the action that will take place when a player plays a Super Sleuth card.
    SwapDestinationMarkers
    The action to switch a destination marker from a player to another one on the table.
    Table
    Table serves to store the list of players in the game, destination markers that are not currently held by a player, the set of cards making up the solution, discard pile, and the deck being used.
    TimerRunnable
    TimerRunnable This class represents a timer that can run on a separate thread and informs a listener when a specified time is reached.
    UpdateTable
    Instruction for updating the clients' Tables with the server's Table
    ViewBuilder
    The ViewBuilder connects the backend model to the GUI.
    YouLose
    Instruction for notifying the player that notifies the player that his/her accusation was incorrect
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ActionCardType
    Lists the different types of action cards in the game.
    LobbyPlayer.Descriptor
    The enumerator describes the type of player in the lobby.
    PlayerState
    PlayerState This enum represents the current state of operations of a player.
